message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested, but $110 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $110 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $95.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down in price, but $95 is still a bit high for me.  I'm sticking with my offer of $85.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your offer, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $92.
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but I'm still at my limit of $85. If you're not willing to go that low, I'm going to have to move on.
Hi Bob, I understand that you're at your limit, but I'm not willing to go below $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $85. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $87.50.
